name: Pixel Warrior: castle defence and roguelike hybrid
name_original: Pixel Warrior: castle defence and roguelike hybrid
description:
Pixel Warrior is a castle-defence and roguelike strategy game where players choose a castle to go toe to toe against enemy castles. Permanent death and level randomisation make no two games alike.

Summon mighty warriors to participate in battle. But beware, as the enemies will defend their castles at all costs.

"Pixel Warrior is a saucy strategy game. De rezzed graphics, reddity humor, and addictive permadeath will keep you tapping long time. 94/100." - PhoneCats

"If you want a challenging defence game, this app is worth checking out." - AppAdvice

"Love love love love LOVE it. Of the thousands I've played, there are only a few iOS games that I've been *this* addicted to for months on end, and of that elite few, this one is the smallest/simplest." - Tom Mayflower

GAME FEATURES

• Upgrade your units to perform faster, stronger and tougher.
• Utilise unique special attacks to gain an advantage over the enemy.
• Summon both ranged and melee creeps for maximum effectiveness.
• 6 unique castles to unlock and use.
• 9 unique enemy castles to fight.
• Over 19 unique creeps to fight with and against.
• Bit-tastic background music by MetrikMusic!
• Day/night cycle accompanied by clouds and weather effects.
• Compare scores against friends and strangers globally on GameCenter.
• Hours of gameplay with over 25 unique achievements!


Download Pixel Warrior now for addictive, strategic fun!
